item.description: "There are other Republicans in Boston??" Yes!! The Boston (Young) Republicans Meetup Group offers opportunities for Boston area Republicans to meet one another and socialize, network, and enjoy the like-minded company. Join us on the 3rd Tuesday of every month for our monthly social/networking meetup. We'll also let you know about meetups for Republican women and other local events of interest. Please see the About pages (link in the menu on the left) for more basic info about this meetup group. Now you can find us on Facebook, too! http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=59682014296 Note: Although many of our group members are YRs, this meetup is not directly affiliated with the Young Republican organization. If you are seeking information regarding the YR organization, visit this website: http://massyrs.org
item.name: Boston (Young) Republicans Meetup Group
